title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Hamburg, Germany - Freiheit
description:
We from freiheit.com (http://freiheit.com/) invite everyone to celebrate the Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 with us in our beautiful office in the heart of St. Pauli. 
If you're interested in test-driven development, pair programming  and learning together with others who share your passion for programming, you shouldn't miss this event! 
Free soft drinks, coffee, snacks, and pizza are waiting for you :-) 
Please register via https://goo.gl/forms/LPiVA2VRTugjsK5t2 
We will start at 10am. 
The address is:
 Budapester Str. 45
 20359 Hamburg 
Google Maps link (https://www.google.de/maps/place/freiheit.com+technologies+gmbh/@53.5553332,9.9619213,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x47b18f4b31e24b69:0x2c027a0fc8d95306!8m2!3d53.55533!4d9.96411) 
Please bring your laptop with prepared development environments for the languages you're comfortable with.
